casebody.data:
In the Matter of Jacob RAIFFA and Fred Zolot, Individually and Trading as Raiffa & Zolot, Bankrupts. A. D. JUILLIARD & CO., Inc., Petitioner-Appellant, v. IRVING TRUST COMPANY, Trustee in Bankruptcy, Appellee. No. 26. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 7, 1932. Max D. Steuer, of New York City (Abrar ham L. Bienstoek and Irving J. Levy, both of New York City, of counsel), for petitioner. Krause, Hirsch & Levin, of New York City (George C. Levin, of New York City, bf counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS' N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
